title: Smaaken Waffle Sandwiches - Food Truck
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Fast food, European, Take-out only, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Food truck in the 28th & Division Food Pod court whose menu is approx. half vegan. All waffles, sweet or savory, can be made with vegan & gluten-free batter. Has vegan sausage and tofu and condiments (aoli, coconut maple butter, coconut whip cream). Vegan markings clearly listed. Uses organic heirloom wheat from local farms and gluten-free flour.
